name: Arctic World Pro Library
description:
This is a 1 Time Purchase, You Get all the following:

All Games Past, Present, and Future release.

All Dlc's. (Make this deal worth it) 

Organized in folder just run game launcher and follow instructions.

Having Paid you will get all game libraries when they release with all dlc's  codes when they come out.

(This a deal of a life time all purchases help goto future project funds. 

Current Games: 

Eternal Lulu and Xari   (No DLC for this game)

Stars Online Pirate Invasion (9 Dlc's)
